description: gc: include full text of import path in error message

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4c87ddb4f642 ***

gc: include full text of import path in error message

FWIW, path->s has been decoded and might contain
arbitrary garbage.  %Z will re-encode it for printing.
Will adjust.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/
